title: Group dialog does not appear when dataset is not set
description: The group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set. Currently, if a table report item is added without setting the dataset and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog does not appear.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog does not appear.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the user should still be able to create a new table group and the group dialog should be displayed.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Verify that the group dialog is displayed.
